are (or are not) using the Checklist in their work. Measuring how often and how well birth 
attendants use the Checklist and deliver the essential birth practices on the Checklist can tell 
you what they find difficult about using the Checklist, allow you to seek help with solving 
those challenges, and identify personal and facility improvements to celebrate with the team
